job_details.Functieomschrijving:
The role will be focused on backend development. You'll focus on delivering product features, developing backend APIs, data collection and ingestion services. Your technical knowledge will drive our backend architecture and mentor the engineering team.

   The team

   Our tech team is based in Amsterdam, where most of us work 2 days a week onsite. We are a lean team of 10 senior engineers and 4 colleagues in Product and Design. Together we operate efficiently and pragmatically, where everyone's voice is heard. We are rapidly scaling so there's plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions. Apart from a short daily stand-up we keep meetings to a minimum. We do a monthly tech-team social event on Tuesday evenings that you are welcome to join.
job_details.full_text:
Staff Engineer (Go)

The role will be focused on backend development. You'll focus on delivering product features, developing backend APIs, data collection and ingestion services. Your technical knowledge will drive our backend architecture and mentor the engineering team.

   The team

   Our tech team is based in Amsterdam, where most of us work 2 days a week onsite. We are a lean team of 10 senior engineers and 4 colleagues in Product and Design. Together we operate efficiently and pragmatically, where everyone's voice is heard. We are rapidly scaling so there's plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions. Apart from a short daily stand-up we keep meetings to a minimum. We do a monthly tech-team social event on Tuesday evenings that you are welcome to join.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes backend development, API creation, and data ingestion services, with a focus on Go. While it mentions 'data collection and ingestion services', there is no explicit mention of AI, machine learning, or generative models, which are core to the ML Engineer and GenAI Engineer profiles. The role appears to be a traditional backend software engineering position.

job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to building and architecting software systems, which falls under traditional software development.
This phrase describes the process of gathering and processing data, which is a key component of data engineering.
These phrases indicate a proactive and leading role in shaping the technical direction and contributing significantly to the product's success.
Mentoring implies guiding and teaching others, and the emphasis on everyone's voice being heard points to collaborative communication.
This phrase directly highlights a practical and efficient approach to problem-solving and operations.
Working in a rapidly scaling environment implies a need for adaptability and continuous learning to keep pace with growth and change.
